means: decrease of received optical power 接收光功率降低

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都表示"落下，下降"之意。
means: descend ： 通常指沿斜线或斜坡下降。
drop ： 指物体从一定高度落下。
fall与drop同义，指突然或猛烈地降落，但fall也可指任何下落，同高度或形式无关。
sink ： 指在空气或水中垂直下降、下沉。

word_mean: 在遗失球或其他状况要将球重新定位时
drop-size distribution pa-rameter 描述单位体积中云(或雨)滴粒子数量随其大小分布的参数。
连接两段高程不同的渠道的阶梯式跌落建筑物。

sentence.Network_en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
sentence.Network_cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

sentence.Network_en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentence.Network_cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentence.Network_en: Daddy called and asked me to drop by his office.
sentence.Network_cn: 爸爸打来电话让我去他办公室一趟。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 丢弃（drop）：当一个包到达时，简单地丢弃，不做其它任何处理。  接受（accept）：和丢弃相反，接受这个包，让这个包通过。

list.abs: She shattered the cup when she dropped it on the floor ., 她把杯子掉在地板上 , 摔得粉碎.
新浪教育_新浪网 ... 2.pirate n. 海盗 3.droppings n. pl. (鸟、兽等的)粪便 1.aristocracy n. 贵族.
石油英语词汇(D6)--石油百科 ... dropping sub 投球短节 dropping 滴；下降；滴下物；空投 dropsonde 下投式探空仪.
drop out 漏失dropping 漏失drum 鼓
介词短语_百度百科 ... drop off 减弱，减少 drop out 退出，离队 fall behind 落后.
英语词组和固定搭配 - 豆丁网 ... drop off 下降，减少；睡着，入睡；让 drop out 退出，退学 dry out (使)干透.

phrase.cizu_name: at the drop of a hat

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)立即；莫名其妙地，一有刺激就

lj.lj_ly: he used to be very bashful, blushing at the drop of a hat.
lj.lj_ls: 他曾经非常害羞，会莫名其妙地脸红。

jx.jx_en_mean: omit the ‘h’ sound from the beginning of words (in Britain often regarded as a sign that the speaker belongs to a low social class)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 省略单词开头的‘h’音（在英国常被认为是说话者社会阶层低下的标志）

jx.jx_en_mean: fall gently asleep, especially without intending to
(N. Amer. informal)make a mistake; mishandle things
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)犯错，出错，做错事

lj.lj_ly: I really dropped the ball on this one.
lj.lj_ls: 在这件事上我的确出了错。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)make an indiscreet or embarrassing remark

lj.lj_ly: he dropped a brick when he admitted that he knew where we were going.
lj.lj_ls: 他不小心说漏了嘴，承认他知道我们要去哪儿。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)make an embarrassing or foolish mistake
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)做事出岔子，犯愚蠢的错误

lj.lj_ly: he admitted he might have dropped his first managerial clanger.
lj.lj_ls: 他承认自己可能在管理上出了第一个岔子。

lj.lj_ly: she had seen her father drop dead of a heart attack.
lj.lj_ls: 她曾看见她父亲因心脏病发作而猝死。

jx.jx_en_mean: abandon one's habitual defensive or protective stance
let fall a hint or hints, as if casually or unconsciously

lj.lj_ly: he was dropping hints that in future he would be taking a back seat in politics.
lj.lj_ls: 他暗示将来要在政坛退居二线。

phrase.cizu_name: a drop in the ocean (或 in a bucket)

jx.jx_en_mean: a very small amount compared with what is needed or expected

lj.lj_ly: the £550 million saving is likely to be a drop in the ocean.
lj.lj_ls: 节约的5.5亿英镑有可能是沧海一粟。

jx.jx_en_mean: send someone a note or letter in a casual manner

lj.lj_ly: drop me a line at the usual address.
lj.lj_ls: 按老地址给我寄封短信。

lj.lj_ly: drop me a line at the usual address.
lj.lj_ls: 按老地址给我寄封短信。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English dropa (noun), droppian (verb), of Germanic origin; related to German Tropfen 'a drop', tropfen 'to drip', also to drip and droop

encyclopedia.content: Drop简介 Drop，译为“坠落击”，全称“Professional wrestling Drop”，译作“职业摔角坠击”，简称“drop”。是摔角比赛中利用对手自身的体重和地心引力将对手高举起后利用自己身体的某个部位实现对对手尾椎骨或后背进行打击的攻击招数。这一招数及其变招在早期的WWE摔角比赛中非常常见，有很多的选手都喜欢用这类招数发动攻击，包括：“自然之子”瑞克·福莱尔（Ric Flair），“心碎小子”肖恩·迈克尔斯（Shawn Michaels），

entry.def: If a level or amount drops or if someone or something drops it, it quickly becomes less.

example.ex: Temperatures can drop to freezing at night...
example.tran: 夜间温度可能会降到零度以下。

example.ex: Once the rate rises it never drops back to its previous level...
example.tran: 一旦价格上去了就再也不会降到以前的水平了。

entry.def: If you drop something, you accidentally let it fall.

example.ex: I dropped my glasses and broke them.
example.tran: 我不小心把眼镜掉下来摔碎了。

entry.def: If something drops onto something else, it falls onto that thing. If something drops from somewhere, it falls from that place.

example.ex: He felt hot tears dropping onto his fingers...
example.tran: 他感觉到热泪掉到他的手指上。

example.ex: Burning embers started dropping from the ceiling...
example.tran: 余火未尽的木块开始从天花板上往下掉。

entry.def: If you drop something somewhere or if it drops there, you deliberately let it fall there.

example.ex: Drop the noodles into the water...
example.tran: 将面条下到水里。

example.ex: He dropped his plate into the sink.
example.tran: 他把盘子丢到水槽里。

entry.def: If a person or a part of their body drops to a lower position, or if they drop a part of their body to a lower position, they move to that position, often in a tired and lifeless way.

example.ex: Nancy dropped into a nearby chair...
example.tran: 南希疲惫地瘫坐到近处的椅子上。

example.ex: She let her head drop...
example.tran: 她低垂着头。

entry.def: To drop is used in expressions such as to be about to drop and to dance until you drop to emphasize that you are exhausted and can no longer continue doing something.

example.ex: She looked about to drop...
example.tran: 她看上去快要累垮了。

example.ex: You have to run until you drop.
example.tran: 一直跑到你跑不动为止。

entry.def: If a man drops his trousers, he pulls them down, usually as a joke or to be rude.

example.ex: A couple of boozy revellers dropped their trousers.
example.tran: 两名醉酒的狂欢者脱掉了他们的裤子。

entry.def: If your voice drops or if you drop your voice, you speak more quietly.

example.ex: Her voice will drop to a dismissive whisper...
example.tran: 她会把声音压低，轻蔑地低语。

example.ex: He dropped his voice and glanced round at the door.
example.tran: 他放低了声音，在门口环视了一下。

entry.tran: 中途放下（某人）;中途卸下（某物）
entry.def: If you drop someone or something somewhere, you take them somewhere and leave them there, usually in a car or other vehicle.

example.ex: He dropped me outside the hotel...
example.tran: 他把我送到了酒店。

example.ex: Many children had been dropped at the stadium by their parents...
example.tran: 很多孩子被家长送到了体育馆。

entry.def: If you drop an idea, course of action, or habit, you do not continue with it.

example.ex: He was told to drop the idea...
example.tran: 他被告知要打消那个主意。

example.ex: The prosecution was forced to drop the case...
example.tran: 控方被迫撤诉。

entry.def: If someone is dropped by a sports team or organization, they are no longer included in that team or employed by that organization.

example.ex: The country's captain was dropped from the tour party to England.
example.tran: 该国的国家队队长无缘英格兰之行。

entry.def: If you drop a game or part of a game in a sports competition, you lose it.

example.ex: Oremans has yet to drop a set.
example.tran: 奥尔曼斯还一局未输。

entry.def: If you drop to a lower position in a sports competition, you move to that position.

example.ex: Britain has dropped from second to third place in the league.
example.tran: 英国在联赛中的排名从第二位降到了第三位。

entry.def: A drop of a liquid is a very small amount of it shaped like a little ball. In informal English, you can also use drop when you are referring to a very small amount of something such as a drink.

example.ex: ...a drop of blue ink...
example.tran: 一滴蓝墨水

example.ex: Add the cream a few drops at a time...
example.tran: 每次加几滴奶油。

entry.def: Drops are a kind of medicine which you put drop by drop into your ears, eyes, or nose.

example.ex: ...eye drops.
example.tran: 眼药水

entry.tran: (水果味或巧克力味的)糖豆，糖果粒
entry.def: Fruit or chocolate drops are small round sweets with a fruit or chocolate flavour.

entry.tran: 落差;垂直距离;下降距离
entry.def: You use drop to talk about vertical distances. For example, a thirty-foot drop is a distance of thirty feet between the top of a cliff or wall and the bottom of it.

example.ex: There was a sheer drop just outside my window...
example.tran: 我的窗外就是垂直深渊。

example.ex: It's only a four-foot drop.
example.tran: 仅有 4 英尺的落差。

entry.def: If you drop a hint, you give a hint or say something in a casual way.

example.ex: If I drop a few hints he might give me a cutting.
example.tran: 如果我给点暗示，他没准会送我一段插枝。

entry.tran: (常指因不喜欢而让别人)终止谈论，不要谈论，谈到此为止
entry.def: If you want someone to drop the subject ,drop it, or let it drop, you want them to stop talking about something, often because you are annoyed that they keep talking about it.

example.ex: Mary Ann wished he would just drop it...
example.tran: 玛丽·安希望他就不要谈论它了。

example.ex: Does that mean you're going to drop the subject?
example.tran: 那是不是意味着你将不再谈论那个话题了？

means.word_mean: 1. a small quantity (especially of a liquid);

sentences.sentence: "one drop of each sample was analyzed"
"any child with a drop of negro blood was legally a negro"
"there is not a drop of pity in that man"

means.word_mean: 2. a shape that is small and round;

sentences.sentence: "he studied the shapes of low-viscosity drops"

means.word_mean: 3. a sudden sharp decrease in some quantity;

sentences.sentence: "a drop of 57 points on the Dow Jones index"
"there was a drop in pressure in the pulmonary artery"
"when that became known the price of their stock went into free fall"

means.word_mean: 4. a steep high face of rock;

sentences.sentence: "he stood on a high cliff overlooking the town"

means.word_mean: 5. a predetermined hiding place for the deposit and distribution of illicit goods (such as drugs or stolen property)
6. a free and rapid descent by the force of gravity;

sentences.sentence: "it was a miracle that he survived the drop from that height"

means.word_mean: 7. a curtain that can be lowered and raised onto a stage from the flies; often used as background scenery
8. a central depository where things can be left or picked up

sentences.sentence: "they expected the drop would be successful"
"the bombs are dropping on enemy targets"

means.word_mean: 4. fall or drop to a lower place or level;
8. leave or unload, especially of passengers or cargo;
9. cause to fall by or as if by delivering a blow;

sentences.sentence: "They dropped her after she had a child out of wedlock"

means.word_mean: 15. let or cause to fall in drops;

sentences.sentence: "he shed his image as a pushy boss"
"The workers on the conveyor belt miss one out of ten"

means.word_mean: 18. change from one level to another;

sentences.sentence: "The discussion devolved into a shouting match"
"The cow dropped her calf this morning"

example.en: Bruno dropped. bul Mr Big got him off.
example.zh: 布鲁诺被捕了，不过中格先生保释了他。

list.explanation: 服用毒品 (麻醉性致幻药物)

example.en: Now he doesn't drop even once a month.
example.zh: 现在他服用毒品一个月连一次都不到。

example.en: He dropped the deer with one shot.
example.zh: 他一枪就把那头鹿打死了。

example.en: Lefty tried to drop the leader of the gang.
example.zh: 莱夫蒂设法想把那帮匪徒的头子干掉。

list.explanation: 击倒(某人)，把(某人)打得倒下

example.en: Jim dropped Willard with a punch to the shoulder.
example.zh: 杰姆一拳打在威拉德肩上，把他打倒了。

example.en: She dropped a bundle in the market yesterday.
example.zh: 昨天她在市场上丢失了一大笔钱。

example.en: He dropped $ 50 in a poker game.
example.zh: 他打扑克输掉了 50美元。

example.en: They worked until they dropped.
example.zh: 他们一直干到累垮为止。

list.explanation: (于某人)断绝关系，终止(与某人) 来往或见面

example.en: She dropped her boyfriend.
example.zh: 她跟她的男朋友分手了。

list.explanation: 把(某人) 除名，使 (某人)退出

example.en: He was dropped from college.
example.zh: 他被大学开除了。

example.en: The minister was dropped for last year's harvest failure.
example.zh: 部长因去年歉收而被解职。fl

list.explanation: 一点酒，一杯酒或其他饮料

example.en: I'll take just another drop of that dew.
example.zh: 我只想再喝一杯那种威士忌。

list.explanation: 赃物或販卖毒品的窝藏处，传递情报的秘密地点

example.en: The police discovered the drop and waited for the runner.
example.zh: 警方发现了那个走私毒品的地方，并守候着走私者来到。

example.en: The drop near the river hasn't been used in years.
example.zh: 河边的那个传递情报的秘密地点已经废弃多年了。

example.en: A pitiful drop wandered up and clown the street.
example.zh: 一个可怜的流浪儿童在街头徘徊。

example.en: give drops to somebody.
example.zh: 向某人行贿

list.explanation: (出租汽车计程表的)开动基数
损失一大笔钱(尤指输于赌博)

example.en: She went to play the slot machines and dropped a bundle.
example.zh: 她去玩吃角子老虎机，结果输了一大笔钱。

example.en: They dropped their teeth when I told them I was married.
example.zh: 我告诉他们我已结婚了，他们听了非常惊讶。

example.en: I do drop my teeth at the notion that Shakespeare is busted and needs to be fixed.
example.zh: 有人居然认为莎士比亚的作品写得不好，需要修改，我听了不禁大吃一惊。

example.en: Drop it! I should never have brought it up.
example.zh: 別闹了!我不应该把那事提出来的。

example.en: Let's drop it. shall we?
example.zh: 我们不谈这个，好吗?

example.en: I think the boy has been concerned in criminal activity. so I've asked him to drop it.
example.zh: 我认为这孩子参与了犯罪活动，所以我叫他别干了。

auth_sentence.content: Lindsay and Henry drop by to chat to Claudia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lindsay and Henry drop by to chat to Claudia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lindsay and Henry drop by to chat to Claudia.

auth_sentence.content: Can I drop out of the Big Personality Test?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can I drop out of the Big Personality Test?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can I drop out of the Big Personality Test?

auth_sentence.content: Can I drop out of the 'Test Your Morality?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can I drop out of the 'Test Your Morality?

Sentence.sentence: Uh, you can either drop it off at my class or bring it to my office.

The authors documented an annual drop of as many as 120,000 cases of heart disease, 66,000 instances of stroke and 99,000 heart attacks caused by high blood pressure after a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt.
bring about a drop in the divorce rate
Both stocks and homes, more widely held, dropped more
Spending on such "durables" dropped at a 12% annual rate in 2008's third quarter, a 20% rate in the fourth.

sentences.en: The apple blossom is beginning to drop.
sentences.cn: 苹果树上的花开始落了。

sentences.en: But in Paris he dropped his medical studies.
sentences.cn: 但是在巴黎他放弃了学医。

sentences.en: He dropped his watch in the bathroom.

means.word_mean: 让人下车, 卸下货物

sentences.en: I'm driving your way so I may drop you at the station.
sentences.cn: 我开车顺路, 所以送你到车站。

means.word_mean: 滴, 滴剂, 滴状物

sentences.en: We really welcome a drop in prices.
sentences.cn: 我们确实欢迎物价下降。

sentences.en: That is a drop of grain sacks from an aircraft to the hungry people on the island.
sentences.cn: 那是从飞机上空投给岛上饥民的一袋袋粮食。

means.word_mean: (水或其他液体)滴，滴下，滴落；滴水

sentences.en: Water dropped from the ceiling into the pan on the floor.
sentences.cn: 水从天花板滴落到地板上的盆子里。

means.word_mean: (因受伤或死等)倒下，累倒；倒毙

sentences.en: A hundred men dropped in the battle.
sentences.cn: 有100人在这次战斗中倒下了。

means.word_mean: (犬等看见猎物时)蹲伏，蹲下或弯身

sentences.en: The dog dropped at the sight of game.

means.word_mean: (随潮流或微风)缓慢移动；随波漂流；随风飘；顺山坡流下；慢慢行进(常与 down 连用)

sentences.en: Our boat gently dropped down with the tide.
sentences.cn: 我们的小船慢慢随潮顺流而下。

jushi.english: A gentle rain dropped yesterday morning.
jushi.chinese: 昨天上午下了一场小雨。

jushi.english: The apple blossoms are beginning to drop.
jushi.chinese: 苹果树上的花开始落了。

jushi.english: The hinges of this door seem to have dropped slightly.
jushi.chinese: 这门的铰链好像有些下坠。
